User: Hello
System: do you like to watch dramas on tv or in person?
User: I watch some dramas on tv. Not really a fan of most dramas.
System: did you ever watch house md?
User: I love that show. I was sad when it went off the air.
System: i have not seen it.
User: The show's about a doctor that solves strange medical cases while fighting his own demons figuratively speaking. It's really interesting I think.
System: that's interesting. i liked it.
User: Cool.
System: do you like the office?
User: I thought the office was weird. Didn't make sense to me.
System: yes, it did really well with the ratings
User: Seems to have been a popular show for a while now.
System: it has been around since 1989.
User: It's amazing how long the show's been on the air isn't it? 
System: it is.
User: Has one wondering where has the time gone.
System: i'm not sure. i saw that there are over 750 episodes.
User: That's a lot of episodes.
System: yeah, about 600 eps every episode.
User: Do you like ghost stories? 
System: some of the stuff. like the exorcist
User: Wow.
System: yea. some of them are pretty good
User: I've read that story and it's more disturbing than the movie.
System: yes, it was supposed to star jack black.
User: I consider ghost stories as entertainment.
System: i don't like them either. how about you?
User: Some ghost stories are just that, stories. However there's some ghost stories that have me question what could actually be out there. Makes you think.
System: i would have thought it was someone much wealthier than lou reed - a very wealthy man
User: Wow.
System: it's been fun chatting!
User: Yes it has.
System: it was fun as well!
User: It was fun! 
System: thank you too! have a great day!
User: Same to you as well!
System: thanks
